components.name: tiqFpA
components.content: Welcome to the Day 1 Questionnaire for the H1N2 response. This questionnaire is for Cases.

components.name: P1Q3
components.title: Interviewers Telephone Number
components.hint: If not a UK phone number, please add the country code

components.name: P1Q5
components.title: Case ID
components.hint: Please enter the Case ID

components.name: tiqGpA
components.content: Tell us if the respondent is the subject of this case report.

components.name: P2Q3
components.title: What is the respondents relationship to the case subject

components.name: P2Q6
components.title: Respondent Employment Position
components.hint: Only applicable for medical workers

components.name: P2Q7
components.title: Respondent Employment Organisation
components.hint: Only applicable for medical workers

components.name: P3Q2
components.title: Date of Death
components.hint: If the case has died, please enter the date of death. If the precise day is not known, please enter 15th of the month

components.name: P3Q3
components.title: If the case has died, was Influenza AH1N2 a contribution to Death

components.name: P3Q5
components.title: Sample Date of Positive Test
components.hint: If the precise day is not known, please enter 15th of the month

components.name: P3Q9
components.title: Date of Birth
components.hint: If the precise day is not known, please enter 15th of the month

components.name: P3Q22
components.title: Healthcare Worker with Direct Patient Care

components.name: P3Q23

components.name: P3Q25
components.title: Does the case work with animals

components.name: P3Q27
components.title: In the 7 days before symptom onset, or a positive test, how many times did you work or attend an educational setting outside the home (any occupation)

components.hint: Tick all that apply

components.hint: Describe using your own words

components.name: P4Q4
components.title: Is the case part of an institutional outbreak

components.hint: e.g. a festival

components.name: P4Q8
components.title: Did the case attend a healthcare facility in the 7 days before your symptoms started

components.name: P4Q10
components.title: Has the case had contact with a confirmed or suspected case in the 7 days before symptom onset or a positive test

components.name: P18Q1

components.name: tiqFpB
components.content: When you proceed on to the next screen you will see a summary of all your responses with an option to submit your report. Before you press submit, press CTRL+P and Save to PDF to save a record of questionnaires and answers.
